titles.title: Original Resolution Honoring Houstonâ€™s Seven Major Black Newspapers
Original Resolution Honoring Houstonâ€™s Seven Major Black Newspapers
Recognizing the historical contributions and value of Houston's 7 major Black publications.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the work and legacy of seven Black publications in Houston, Texas, and acknowledges their role in elevating voices and shaping narratives within the African-American community and society at large.
